title: Should I get Riven, Jayce, or Kennen for top/mid?
body: Should I get Riven, Jayce, or Kennen for top/mid?

replies.body: either way you'll be a bad person

depends on what ur tryna do. kennen and jayce are better flex picks for top and mid, i wouldn't recommend taking riven mid unless you can destroy the match-up. riven will also take you a lot longer to be competent at - you can probably be decent faster with jayce or kennen ( mainly kennen. ) i would however say riven is the most rewarding in the long haul and you get to have fun really tearing the kit apart.

If you want to auto win games. Get Kennen rush the Dash item and one shot an entire team with ult and dash. :D Cause balance :D :D :D : D :D Oh and grab Ghost too just to make your engage that much more impossible to react too.
